Text:
I downloaded, I uncompressed, would not play back in Media cCenter under windows 7, got it playing in Media Player but very disapointed when it finished about 20 minutes before the end, possibly a corrupt MKV file. Not Like Dimension.
I am downloading it again and will give it another go but this is no where near the standard of other Dimension downloads I have watched, will give feed back after I have downloaded again !
Perfect the second download worked perfectly and fantastic quality as always, thankyou sceneline, perfect A10 V10 and a perfect MKV File.
